INSERT INTO T_ORDER( F_ID, F_INVENTORYID, F_ORDERSTATUS, F_PRICE, F_SHOPNUM, F_CREATETIME, F_UPDATETIME )
SELECT #{order.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.inventoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{list.shopNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') FROM dual

INSERT INTO T_ORDER_COMMODITY( F_ID, F_COMMODITY_ID, F_ORDER_ID, F_SHOP_NUM )
SELECT #{oa.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{oa.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oa.shopNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} FROM dual

INSERT INTO T_ORDER( F_ID, F_CUSTOMER_ID, F_TRACK_ID, F_ORDER_STATUS, F_CREATE_TIMESTAMP, F_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ) VALUES ( #{order.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.trackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT t1.F_ID, t2.F_NAME, t2.F_EN_NAME, t2.F_BRAND, t1.F_SHOPNUM, t1.F_PRICE FROM T_ORDER t1 LEFT JOIN T_COMMODITY T2 ON t1.F_INVENTORYID = t2.F_ID WHERE t1.F_ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

WITH tmp AS ( SELECT t1.F_ID,SUM(t2.f_shop_num * t3.f_price) F_TOTAL_PRICE FROM T_ORDER t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_COMMODITY t2 ON t1.F_ID = t2.F_ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN T_COMMODITY t3 ON t2.F_COMMODITY_ID = t3.F_ID WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY t1.F_ID ) SELECT t1.F_ID, t1.F_ID F_ORDER_NUM, t1.F_TRACK_ID, t1.F_ORDER_STATUS,t2.F_NAME F_NAME,t3.F_TOTAL_PRICE F_TOTAL_PRICE FROM T_ORDER t1 LEFT JOIN T_CUSTOMER t2 ON t1.F_CUSTOMER_ID = t2.F_ID LEFT JOIN tmp t3 ON t1.F_ID = t3.F_ID ORDER BY F_ORDER_NUM

SELECT t1.F_ID F_ORDER_NUM,t2.F_ID F_CUSTOMER_ID,t2.F_NAME,t2.F_NICKNAME,t2.F_IDCARD,t2.F_TEL,t2.F_ADDRESS,t1.F_TRACK_ID,t1.F_ORDER_STATUS FROM T_ORDER t1 LEFT JOIN T_CUSTOMER t2 ON t1.F_CUSTOMER_ID = t2.F_ID WHERE 1=1 AND t1.F_ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t3.F_ID,t3.F_NAME F_COMMODITY_NAME,t2.F_SHOP_NUM,t3.F_PRICE,t3.F_BASE_PRICE,(t3.F_PRICE - t3.F_BASE_PRICE) F_REPRICE FROM T_ORDER t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_COMMODITY t2 ON t1.F_ID = t2.F_ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN T_COMMODITY t3 ON t2.F_COMMODITY_ID = t3.F_ID WHERE t1.F_ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
